name: Keith Godchaux
description: '''Keith Richard Godchaux''' (July 19, 1948 â€“ July 23, 1980) was an American [[pianist]] best known for his tenure in the [[Rock music|rock]] group the [[Grateful Dead]] from 1971 to 1979. Following their departure from the Dead, he and his wife [[Donna Jean Godchaux|Donna]] formed the [[Heart of Gold Band]] in 1980, but Godchaux died from injuries sustained in a car accident shortly after their first concert.
